name: Miscreated Monster
aura: Increases Ally HP in the Arena by 33%.

skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 15% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 50% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] for 1 turn if the [Stun] debuff is placed.
Attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn. Places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 3 turns equal to 25% of the damage inflicted.
Places a 50% [Ally Protection] buff on all allies except this Champion for 3 turns. Heals this Champion by 50% of their MAX HP. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 3 turns.
Places a [Fear] debuff on the attacker for 1 turn whenever an ally is attacked while under an [Ally Protection] buff.
